releases.changelog:
Release v0.9.0

See CHANGELOG.md for details.

metadata.tag_message:
v0.9.0: Alpha Stability & Audio System

Major milestone release featuring:
- Complete audio system breakthrough (fixed since inception)
- Monolith architecture extraction (558+ lines)
- Critical stability improvements (5 GitHub issues resolved)
- Comprehensive documentation reorganization
- Enhanced test suite with re-enabled sound tests
- Ready for stable alpha and beta progression
